title: Toxic positivity is positivity that does more harm than good. What are some of the most common examples of this? - Quora

response.answer_text: Someone encouraging other to do the things that virtually impossible for them, close to delusional. example : Encourage person to keep trying and never give up, although she/he keep failed in the same subject. Sometimes giving up is OK, it’s better to work on different things that more suited for you than keep suffering from same failure.
